mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T07_PER_SET ( PER_ID , SHOW_TYPE , CONTACT_SHOW , VOICE_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{perID} , #{showType} , #{contactShow} , #{voiceType} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T07_PER_SET SET PER_ID = #{perID} , SHOW_TYPE = #{showType} , CONTACT_SHOW = #{contactShow} , VOICE_TYPE = #{voiceType} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , SHOW_TYPE AS "showType" , CONTACT_SHOW AS "contactShow" , VOICE_TYPE AS "voiceType" FROM T07_PER_SET WHERE ID = #{iD}
SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , SHOW_TYPE AS "showType" , CONTACT_SHOW AS "contactShow" , VOICE_TYPE AS "voiceType" FROM T07_PER_SET WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE
